room_title: Escape room "Beyond Medusaâ€™s Gate VR" by Epic Team Adventures in Seattle
review: Recently we tried out their VR games, and they were fine as far as VR games go. They don't quite feel the same as a physical escape room, but were reasonable. Do Assassin's Creed if you want to be in an action movie, and Huxley if you want to be in a virtual escape room.
